API¶

class etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.parser.config.Records(resource_name: str, masks: list, keep: str, parser: object, item: str)¶

Bases: object

Class for storing parameters to parse files

Parameters: - resource_name (str): The name of the resource being parsed. - masks (list): A list of masks used to filter files for parsing. - keep (str): Indicates whether to keep all data (ALL) or only the last record (LAST). - parser (object): The parser class to be used for parsing. - item (str): The specific item to be extracted from the parsed files.

item: str¶
keep: str¶
masks: list¶
parser: object¶
resource_name: str¶
class etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.parser.config.Meta(resource_name: str, masks: list, keep: str)¶

Bases: object

Class for storing parameters to parse meta

Parameters: - resource_name (str): The name of the resource to extract meta information from. - masks (list): A list of masks used to filter files for meta extraction. - keep (str): Indicates whether to keep all data (ALL) or only the last record (LAST).

keep: str¶
masks: list¶
resource_name: str¶
class etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.parser.config.Collection(resource: Resource, *masks, keep: str = 'all')¶

Bases: object

Class-configuration for a single collection of data.

Parameters: - resource (str): The name of the resource for the collection. - *masks (str): Variable number of masks used to filter files for the collection. - keep (str, optional): Indicates whether to keep all data or only the last record. Defaults to ALL.

Methods: - parse(parser, item): Returns a Records object with the specified parser and item for the collection. - meta(): Returns a Meta object for the collection.

meta()¶

Creates and returns a Meta object for the collection.

Returns: - Meta: A Meta object with the resource name, masks, and keep value.

parse(parser, item)¶

Creates and returns a Records object with the specified parser and item for the collection.

Parameters: - parser (object): The parser class or object to be used for parsing. - item (str): The specific item to be extracted from the parsed files.

Returns: - Records: A Records object with the provided parameters.
